channel.title: Removing fences
channel.description: Alright, so I was wondering if anyone could help me remove peices of fence, it isn't a square object, so I can't use "deletethatobject" and I was already told it was in the cache. So I was just wondering if you could tell me how to remove about 4 peice of fence from my game, the exact fence peices are the two peice left of the camelot castle gate and the two peices to the right of the gate.

item.title: Removing fences
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

No, it isn’t the “deletethatobject” void. It’s in the cache, client sided. The fence isn’t on a x, y axis anyways. Still need help on how to remove them though.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing fences
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

Well this is server-sided, and it will be “public void Deletewalls() {”.
deletethatwall(XXXX, YYYY);

You’ll probably have to play around with the coords figuring out which side deletes which wall.

Read full topic
